title: Prosumers and sustainable development: An international assessment in the field of renewable energy
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 7

Author(s): Walter Leal Filho, Laís Viera Trevisan, Amanda Lange Salvia, Janaina Mazutti, Thais Dibbern, Salvador Ruiz de Maya, Elvira Ferrer Bernal, João Henrique Paulino Pires Eustachio, Ayyoob Sharifi, María-del-Carmen Alarcón-del-Amo, Iryna Kushnir
